title: Spelt, smoked salmon and spinach tart
description: A wholesome tart with a creamy salmon and spinach filling. Try substituting the spinach with asparagus when it's in season.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz plain white flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/2½oz butter, chopped, plus extra for greasing
1 tsp sea salt, plus extra to taste
1 tsp freshly ground black pepper, plus extra to taste
150g/5½oz smoked salmon slices, cut into 1cm/½in squares
400g/14oz kale, trimmed, washed, shredded and excess water squeezed out
